claim: Facebook is a social networking device.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Facebook is an American for-profit corporation and an online social media and social networking service based in Menlo Park , California .

claim: Facebook is a social networking device.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The Facebook website was launched on February 4 , 2004 , by Mark Zuckerberg , along with fellow Harvard College students and roommates , Eduardo Saverin , Andrew McCollum , Dustin Moskovitz , and Chris Hughes .

claim: Facebook is a social networking device.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The founders had initially limited the website 's membership to Harvard students ; however , later they expanded it to higher education institutions in the Boston area , the Ivy League schools , and Stanford University .

claim: Facebook is a social networking device.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Facebook gradually added support for students at various other universities , and eventually to high school students as well .

claim: Facebook is a social networking device.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Since 2006 , anyone age 13 and older has been allowed to become a registered user of Facebook , though variations exist in the minimum age requirement , depending on applicable local laws .

claim: Facebook is a social networking device.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The Facebook name comes from the face book directories often given to United States university students .

claim: Facebook is a social networking device.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Facebook may be accessed by a large range of desktops , laptops , tablet computers , and smartphones over the Internet and mobile networks .

claim: Facebook is a social networking device.
premise_source_doc_sentence: After registering to use the site , users can create a user profile indicating their name , occupation , schools attended and so on .

claim: Facebook is a social networking device.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Users can add other users as `` friends '' , exchange messages , post status updates and digital photos , share digital videos and links , use various software applications  (  `` apps ''  )  , and receive notifications when others update their profiles or make posts .

claim: Facebook is a social networking device.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Additionally , users may join common-interest user groups organized by workplace , school , hobbies or other topics , and categorize their friends into lists such as `` People From Work '' or `` Close Friends '' .

claim: Facebook is a social networking device.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In groups , editors can pin posts to top .

claim: Facebook is a social networking device.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Additionally , users can complain about or block unpleasant people .

claim: Facebook is a social networking device.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Because of the large volume of data that users submit to the service , Facebook has come under scrutiny for its privacy policies .

claim: Facebook is a social networking device.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Facebook makes most of its revenue from advertisements which appear onscreen .

claim: Facebook is a social networking device.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Facebook , Inc. held its initial public offering  (  IPO  )  in February 2012 , and began selling stock to the public three months later , reaching an original peak market capitalization of $ 104 billion .

claim: Facebook is a social networking device.
premise_source_doc_sentence: On July 13 , 2015 , Facebook became the fastest company in the Standard & Poor 's 500 Index to reach a market cap of $ 250 billion .

claim: Facebook is a social networking device.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Facebook has more than 1.94 billion monthly active users as of March 31 , 2017 .

claim: Facebook is a social networking device.
premise_source_doc_sentence: As of April 2016 , Facebook was the most popular social networking site in the world , based on the number of active user accounts .

claim: Facebook is a social networking device.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Facebook classifies users from the ages of 13 to 18 as minors and therefore sets their profiles to share content with friends only .

claim: Facebook is a social networking device.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Since the arrival of early social networking sites in the early 2000s , online social networking platforms have expanded exponentially , with the biggest names in social media in the mid-2010s being Facebook , Instagram , Twitter and SnapChat .

claim: Facebook is a social networking device.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In 2009 , the social networking website Facebook  (  launched in 2004  )  became the largest social networking website in the world .

claim: Facebook is a social networking device.
premise_source_doc_sentence: A social networking service  (  also social networking site , SNS or social media  )  is an online platform that is used by people to build social networks or social relations with other people who share similar personal or career interests , activities , backgrounds or real-life connections .

claim: Facebook is a social networking device.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Social network services can be split into three types : socializing social network services are primarily for socializing with existing friends  (  e.g. , Facebook  )  ; networking social network services are primarily for non-social interpersonal communication  (  e.g. , LinkedIn , a career and employment-oriented site  )  ; and social navigation social network services are primarily for helping users to find specific information or resources  (  e.g. , Goodreads for books  )  .

claim: Facebook is a social networking device.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Many web-based social networking sites , such as Facebook and Twitter , have created mobile applications to give their users instant and real-time access from anywhere they have access to the Internet .
